name: Cayenne Cashews
author: Leslie Mehl Gibbs
summary: These nuts are to die for! I do not like spicy food and I love these. My mom gave me this recipe and I am now making them on a weekly basis!
directions: Whisk egg white in a medium bowl until frothy
Preheat oven to 250 degrees F (120 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Combine sugar, cumin, salt, and cayenne pepper in a small bowl
Pour over cashews and toss to coat
Spread cashews on the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven, stirring halfway through, until fragrant, about 40 minutes
Reduce oven temperature to 200 degrees F (93 degrees C)
Continue baking, stirring every 20 minutes, until cashews look dry, 30 to 40 minutes
Transfer cashews to a container and let cool, shaking or stirring occasionally to prevent them from sticking together
